title: FTL 1.03.3 Mac November
description:
FTL: Faster Than Light is a top down, real time strategy game created by indie developers Subset games. In the game the player controls the crew of a single spacecraft, holding critical information to be delivered to an allied fleet several sectors away, while being pursued by a large rebel fleet.The player must guide the spacecraft over a large number of secotrs, each with planetary systems and events procedurally generated in a roguelike fashion, while facing against rebel and other hostile forces, recruiting new crew, and outfitting and upgrading their ship.

^ Wikipedia


Installation:
1. Download
2. Unzip
3. Install
4. Enjoy
5. If you like it, buy it!


Features:

- Top-down space combat!
-          PERMADEATH!
- Roguelike(ie)^
- Guns, lasers, and pew pew pew
- "Help them anonymous gamer, you are their only hope"

=P


It is a DRM - Free download purchased directly from their site.. IE = No cracks required!

Once more, enjoy the gameplay, I'll update as updates happen..    and Should you like the game, GO BUY IT!
